tool.name: pRESTO ParseLog
tool.description: Create tabular report from pRESTO log file

param.name: log_file
param.label: pRESTO log file
param.help: Detailed log file generated from a pRESTO tool.

param.name: fields
param.label: Field(s)
param.help: Space-separated list of fields to extract.

tool.help:
Creates tab-separated tabular reports from pRESTO detailed log files.
See the See the `pRESTO online help <https://presto.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tools/ParseLog.html>`_ for more information.
